title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration; drop-in LLM and chat model for chains, agents, RAG.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration; build local RAG pipelines backed by any Ollama model.

title: Ollama WebUI
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama servers; no API keys needed.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and prompt template manager that wraps the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local code completion and chat via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-stage Dockerfile for CPU & CUDA images; run Ollama in any container runtime.

title: Ollama on Home Assistant
summary: Home Assistant add-on that starts an Ollama server on your edge device for private voice assistants.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama; Kotlin & Android friendly.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-chat-shell
summary: Bash script for quick multi-line chat sessions with any Ollama model from the terminal.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles (CodeLlama, WizardCoder, SQLCoder, etc.) ready to import.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Utility that converts GPT4All model binaries into Ollama-compatible GGUF Modelfiles.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, custom models, and troubleshooting Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing the release of Ollama v0.1.30 with concurrent model loading.

title: Ollama – Private ChatGPT in 100 lines of Python
summary: Step-by-step blog post showing how to build a Gradio chat UI backed by Ollama in minutes.

title: Ollama YouTube Walkthrough
summary: Video tutorial covering installation, model pulling, REST API, and LangChain integration.
